scripts.dev: pnpm supabase:ensure && pnpm --parallel --filter uxicai --filter solidicai dev
scripts.kill-dev: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; echo 'Servers stopped'
scripts.supabase:reset: echo '\033[0;31m⚠️  WARNING: This will DESTROY ALL DATA!\033[0m' && read -p 'Type YES to confirm: ' confirm && [ "$confirm" = "YES" ] && supabase db reset || echo 'Reset cancelled'
